itemInfo.itemDesc: An ingredient used in Cooking. It can be created by Shaking salt with the cream obtained from Shaking milk.\n\n- Usage: Cheese Pie, Seafood Grilled with Butter

item.name: Salt
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vender or Innkeeper.

item.name: Cream
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be created by Shaking sugar with the milk obtained from a farm Quest.\n\n- Usage: Fruit Pie, Fish Soup, etc.
